description: Do you own a small business? Is your business more disorganized than organized? Are you tired of teaching your staff the same things over and over? Do you have to be at your business to supervize it? Is it difficult to manage the expectations of your staff? Did you know that there are free tools to...... Create your systems (with video, checklists, and charts). Assign your systems to be done by your staff anywhere. Supervise the results of the system from anywhere you have an internet connection. This is not just a theory. Step by step, Korbett Miller will show you how to use these tools to create your business processes. You will enjoy a level of freedom and performance few small businesses achieve. Video instruction built into your systems. Schedule your systems to be ran whenever you want. Supervise the systems in seconds. Start to De-Mythify your business!
title: Manage your Business Remotely with Online Tools
